Package org.rcsb.mbt.controllers.update

When the model or other aspects of the scene or viewer changes, update notifications need to be forwarded to the concerned parties.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IUpdateListener Anything that wants to be notified when the model changes (structures added, removed) will implement this interface
 

Class Summary
UpdateController Contains a list of registered listeners that need to be updated either when the model changes, or when other controllers decide they need to be reset.
UpdateEvent An event generated when structural changes are made to a StructureDocument.
 

Enum Summary
UpdateEvent.Action The possible actions for this event type EXTENDED is for derived classes to use.
 

Package org.rcsb.mbt.controllers.update Description

When the model or other aspects of the scene or viewer changes, update notifications need to be forwarded to the concerned parties. The implementation is an 'observer' pattern, where interested parties register with the update controller, and are notified by it when necessary.

The primary class is UpdateController. In addition there are two support classes:

UpdateEvent
An update event contains information for the update. It is created by the update controller and then forwarded to the registered recipients.
IUpdateListener
Registrants must implement this interface to receive updates.

Update Flow

The ideal sequence of update flow can be visualized in the following diagram:

In this conception, changes are never reflected by the UI, directly, but are updated by the model.

Not all updates in the MBT occur this way, at present, however further changes and refactoring are continuing in that direction.
